title: Stockholm
description: 3-day trip to Stockholm exploring Swedish history, royal palaces, and the cultural treasures of the archipelago

points.name: FR3173 (Ryanair)
points.description: Ryanair flight from Porto to Stockholm

points.name: Stockholm City Hall
points.description: Waterside government offices completed in 1923 & made from red brick with a lantern-topped tower.

points.name: Royal Swedish Opera
points.description: National stage for opera & ballet productions in a 19th-century theater with a lavish interior.

points.name: Parliament House
points.description: Parliament buildings with 1 chamber, inaugurated in 1905 & connected by underground tunnels.

points.name: The Royal Palace
points.description: Baroque-style royal palace with 3 museums & a vast library. Admission fee can include a guided tour.

points.name: Skattkammaren
points.description: Royal Treasury displaying crown jewels and royal regalia.

points.name: Gamla stan
points.description: The bustling, compact island of Gamla Stan is the city's old town, with cobbled streets and colorful 17th- and 18th-century buildings.

points.name: Storkyrkan
points.description: Brick Gothic cathedral known as the Great Church, with artifacts & an iconic statue of St. George.

points.name: Stortorget
points.description: Picturesque main square in Stockholm's Gamla Stan (Old Town), lined with colorful buildings & cafes.

points.name: Saint Gertrude, German Church
points.description: Small German church dating to the Middle Ages, with striking stained glass & a baroque interior.

points.name: M√•rten Trotzigs gr√§nd
points.description: Narrowing to 90 cm, this snug, lantern-studded alley is considered to be the city's narrowest road.

points.name: Riddarholmen Church
points.description: Former church now used for burial & commemorative purposes with sections dating from 13th century.

points.name: Monteliusv√§gen
points.description: Peaceful walking path offering scenic views of Lake M√§laren & downtown Stockholm.

points.name: √ñstermalm
points.description: Elegant √ñstermalm is known for its smart bars and restaurants on Stureplan square, and its cultural venues.

points.name: Strandv√§gen
points.description: Storied avenue featuring elegant buildings & a famed waterfront strip dotted with boats.

points.name: Vasa Museum
points.description: Museum for well-preserved, 17th-century warship, Vasa, that sank on her maiden voyage in 1628.

points.name: Vrak - Museum of Wrecks
points.description: Maritime museum showcasing shipwrecks and underwater archaeology.

points.name: The Viking Museum
points.description: Museum displaying wooden, 9th-century Viking ships, plus artifacts recovered from burial tombs.

points.name: Skansen
points.description: Open-air Swedish history museum, with buildings, people in costume & a zoo with Nordic animals.

points.name: ABBA The Museum
points.description: Collection of the pop group's memorabilia & interactive exhibits, including a studio & dance floor.

points.name: Drottninggatan
points.description: Major pedestrian shopping street in central Stockholm.

points.name: Nordiska museet
points.description: Displays on native traditions & trends in home decor & fashion, plus festivals & events.

points.name: Junibacken
points.description: Fun park devoted to young children's literature with a theater, a train & a playhouse, plus parties.

points.name: Gr√∂na Lund
points.description: Seasonal amusement park with roller coasters & thrill rides, competitive games & live concerts.

points.name: Djurg√•rden
points.description: Leafy island with an amusement park, landscaped gardens & parks, many museums & stately homes.

points.name: Prins Eugens Waldemarsudde
points.description: Castlelike palace museum containing the collection of Prince Eugen & hosting temporary exhibits.

points.name: Drottningholm Palace
points.description: Well-preserved 1600s royal residence, with a Chinese Pavilion pleasure palace, theater & gardens.

points.name: The Chinese Pavilion
points.description: 1760s-era royal Chinese-style pavilion with a Rococo interior, set in parkland, with guided tours.

points.name: Drottningholms Slottsteater
points.description: Conserved UNESCO heritage listed opera house & theater built in 1766 & offering backstage tours.

points.name: S√∂dermalm
points.description: This urban island features a trendy neighborhood, plus museums & creative retail shops.

points.name: T-Centralen
points.description: Central subway station and main transportation hub of Stockholm.

points.name: Fotografiska
points.description: Museum in a brick-built, former customs house with a contemporary photography exhibition program.

points.name: Nobel Prize Museum
points.description: Exhibits about the history of the Nobel Prize & the significant contributions made by its winners.

points.name: FR316 (Ryanair)
points.description: Ryanair flight from Stockholm to Porto
